rule: The output must classify a given input text into none of the following specific categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech.
input: Movie stars flock to red carpet at Cannes Festival
validityText:

According to the input specification, valid inputs must be news articles or headlines that fall into one of the specified categories: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech. 

The Cannes Film Festival is primarily an entertainment event that does not directly fall under World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech categories as specified. Therefore, the input does not comply with the specification as its subject matter is outside the designated categories.
